onset.Description: onset time of event in seconds.

duration.Description: Duration of the event in seconds.

Levels.cue_shape: Instruction cue indicating a shape matching task will begin.
Levels.shape_block: Block period during which multiple shape stimuli are presented for matching decisions.
Levels.shape_stim: A visual shape stimulus is presented, participant must decide if shapes match.
Levels.cue_face: Instruction cue indicating a face matching task will begin.
Levels.face_block: Block period during which multiple face stimuli are presented for matching decisions.
Levels.face_stim: A facial image is presented, participant must decide if faces match.

block_type.Description: Type and repetition of the emotion task block.
